_header: At a spring well under a thorn
_description: The Virgin Mary by the fountain of love — four lines in couplets

OxfMagd60.Transcription:
At a sprynge wel vnder a þornþer was bote of bale a lytel
                    here a fornþer by syde stant a mayde fulle of loue y boundehe so
                    wol seche trwe loue yn hyr hyt schal be founde
